00066 int _nmea_parse_time(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaTIME *res)
00067 {
00068     int success = 0;
00069 
00070     switch(buff_sz)
00071     {
00072     case sizeof("hhmmss") - 1:
00073         success = (3 == nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00074             "%2d%2d%2d", &(res->hour), &(res->min), &(res->sec)
00075             ));
00076         break;
00077     case sizeof("hhmmss.s") - 1:
00078     case sizeof("hhmmss.ss") - 1:
00079     case sizeof("hhmmss.sss") - 1:
00080         success = (4 == nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00081             "%2d%2d%2d.%d", &(res->hour), &(res->min), &(res->sec), &(res->hsec)
00082             ));
00083         break;
00084     default:
00085         nmea_error("Parse of time error (format error)!");
00086         success = 0;
00087         break;
00088     }
00089 
00090     return (success?0:-1);        
00091 }
00092 
00100 int nmea_pack_type(const char *buff, int buff_sz)
00101 {
00102     static const char *pheads[] = {
00103         "GPGGA",
00104         "GPGSA",
00105         "GPGSV",
00106         "GPRMC",
00107         "GPVTG",
00108     };
00109 
00110     NMEA_ASSERT(buff);
00111 
00112     if(buff_sz < 5)
00113         return GPNON;
00114     else if(0 == memcmp(buff, pheads[0], 5))
00115         return GPGGA;
00116     else if(0 == memcmp(buff, pheads[1], 5))
00117         return GPGSA;
00118     else if(0 == memcmp(buff, pheads[2], 5))
00119         return GPGSV;
00120     else if(0 == memcmp(buff, pheads[3], 5))
00121         return GPRMC;
00122     else if(0 == memcmp(buff, pheads[4], 5))
00123         return GPVTG;
00124 
00125     return GPNON;
00126 }
00127 
00135 int nmea_find_tail(const char *buff, int buff_sz, int *res_crc)
00136 {
00137     static const int tail_sz = 3 /* *[CRC] */ + 2 /* \r\n */;
00138 
00139     const char *end_buff = buff + buff_sz;
00140     int nread = 0;
00141     int crc = 0;
00142 
00143     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && res_crc);
00144 
00145     *res_crc = -1;
00146 
00147     for(;buff < end_buff; ++buff, ++nread)
00148     {
00149         if(('$' == *buff) && nread)
00150         {
00151             buff = 0;
00152             break;
00153         }
00154         else if('*' == *buff)
00155         {
00156             if(buff + tail_sz <= end_buff && '\r' == buff[3] && '\n' == buff[4])
00157             {
00158                 *res_crc = nmea_atoi(buff + 1, 2, 16);
00159                 nread = buff_sz - (int)(end_buff - (buff + tail_sz));
00160                 if(*res_crc != crc)
00161                 {
00162                     *res_crc = -1;
00163                     buff = 0;
00164                 }
00165             }
00166 
00167             break;
00168         }
00169         else if(nread)
00170             crc ^= (int)*buff;
00171     }
00172 
00173     if(*res_crc < 0 && buff)
00174         nread = 0;
00175 
00176     return nread;
00177 }

00186 int nmea_parse_GPGGA(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGGA *pack)
00187 {
00188     char time_buff[NMEA_TIMEPARSE_BUF];
00189 
00190     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && pack);
00191 
00192     memset(pack, 0, sizeof(nmeaGPGGA));
00193 
00194     nmea_trace_buff(buff, buff_sz);
00195 
00196     if(14 != nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00197         "$GPGGA,%s,%f,%C,%f,%C,%d,%d,%f,%f,%C,%f,%C,%f,%d*",
00198         &(time_buff[0]),
00199         &(pack->lat), &(pack->ns), &(pack->lon), &(pack->ew),
00200         &(pack->sig), &(pack->satinuse), &(pack->HDOP), &(pack->elv), &(pack->elv_units),
00201         &(pack->diff), &(pack->diff_units), &(pack->dgps_age), &(pack->dgps_sid)))
00202     {
00203         nmea_error("GPGGA parse error!");
00204         return 0;
00205     }
00206 
00207     if(0 != _nmea_parse_time(&time_buff[0], (int)strlen(&time_buff[0]), &(pack->utc)))
00208     {
00209         nmea_error("GPGGA time parse error!");
00210         return 0;
00211     }
00212 
00213     return 1;
00214 }

00223 int nmea_parse_GPGSA(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGSA *pack)
00224 {
00225     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && pack);
00226 
00227     memset(pack, 0, sizeof(nmeaGPGSA));
00228 
00229     nmea_trace_buff(buff, buff_sz);
00230 
00231     if(17 != nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00232         "$GPGSA,%C,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%f,%f,%f*",
00233         &(pack->fix_mode), &(pack->fix_type),
00234         &(pack->sat_prn[0]), &(pack->sat_prn[1]), &(pack->sat_prn[2]), &(pack->sat_prn[3]), &(pack->sat_prn[4]), &(pack->sat_prn[5]),
00235         &(pack->sat_prn[6]), &(pack->sat_prn[7]), &(pack->sat_prn[8]), &(pack->sat_prn[9]), &(pack->sat_prn[10]), &(pack->sat_prn[11]),
00236         &(pack->PDOP), &(pack->HDOP), &(pack->VDOP)))
00237     {
00238         nmea_error("GPGSA parse error!");
00239         return 0;
00240     }
00241 
00242     return 1;
00243 }
00244 
00252 int nmea_parse_GPGSV(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPGSV *pack)
00253 {
00254     int nsen, nsat;
00255 
00256     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && pack);
00257 
00258     memset(pack, 0, sizeof(nmeaGPGSV));
00259 
00260     nmea_trace_buff(buff, buff_sz);
00261 
00262     nsen = nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00263         "$GPGSV,%d,%d,%d,"
00264         "%d,%d,%d,%d,"
00265         "%d,%d,%d,%d,"
00266         "%d,%d,%d,%d,"
00267         "%d,%d,%d,%d*",
00268         &(pack->pack_count), &(pack->pack_index), &(pack->sat_count),
00269         &(pack->sat_data[0].id), &(pack->sat_data[0].elv), &(pack->sat_data[0].azimuth), &(pack->sat_data[0].sig),
00270         &(pack->sat_data[1].id), &(pack->sat_data[1].elv), &(pack->sat_data[1].azimuth), &(pack->sat_data[1].sig),
00271         &(pack->sat_data[2].id), &(pack->sat_data[2].elv), &(pack->sat_data[2].azimuth), &(pack->sat_data[2].sig),
00272         &(pack->sat_data[3].id), &(pack->sat_data[3].elv), &(pack->sat_data[3].azimuth), &(pack->sat_data[3].sig));
00273 
00274     nsat = (pack->pack_index - 1) * NMEA_SATINPACK;
00275     nsat = (nsat + NMEA_SATINPACK > pack->sat_count)?pack->sat_count - nsat:NMEA_SATINPACK;
00276     nsat = nsat * 4 + 3 /* first three sentence`s */;
00277 
00278     if(nsen < nsat || nsen > (NMEA_SATINPACK * 4 + 3))
00279     {
00280         nmea_error("GPGSV parse error!");
00281         return 0;
00282     }
00283 
00284     return 1;
00285 }
00286 
00294 int nmea_parse_GPRMC(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPRMC *pack)
00295 {
00296     int nsen;
00297     char time_buff[NMEA_TIMEPARSE_BUF];
00298 
00299     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && pack);
00300 
00301     memset(pack, 0, sizeof(nmeaGPRMC));
00302 
00303     nmea_trace_buff(buff, buff_sz);
00304 
00305     nsen = nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00306         "$GPRMC,%s,%C,%f,%C,%f,%C,%f,%f,%2d%2d%2d,%f,%C,%C*",
00307         &(time_buff[0]),
00308         &(pack->status), &(pack->lat), &(pack->ns), &(pack->lon), &(pack->ew),
00309         &(pack->speed), &(pack->direction),
00310         &(pack->utc.day), &(pack->utc.mon), &(pack->utc.year),
00311         &(pack->declination), &(pack->declin_ew), &(pack->mode));
00312 
00313     if(nsen != 13 && nsen != 14)
00314     {
00315         nmea_error("GPRMC parse error!");
00316         return 0;
00317     }
00318 
00319     if(0 != _nmea_parse_time(&time_buff[0], (int)strlen(&time_buff[0]), &(pack->utc)))
00320     {
00321         nmea_error("GPRMC time parse error!");
00322         return 0;
00323     }
00324 
00325     if(pack->utc.year < 90)
00326         pack->utc.year += 100;
00327     pack->utc.mon -= 1;
00328 
00329     return 1;
00330 }
00331 
00339 int nmea_parse_GPVTG(const char *buff, int buff_sz, nmeaGPVTG *pack)
00340 {
00341     NMEA_ASSERT(buff && pack);
00342 
00343     memset(pack, 0, sizeof(nmeaGPVTG));
00344 
00345     nmea_trace_buff(buff, buff_sz);
00346 
00347     if(8 != nmea_scanf(buff, buff_sz,
00348         "$GPVTG,%f,%C,%f,%C,%f,%C,%f,%C*",
00349         &(pack->dir), &(pack->dir_t),
00350         &(pack->dec), &(pack->dec_m),
00351         &(pack->spn), &(pack->spn_n),
00352         &(pack->spk), &(pack->spk_k)))
00353     {
00354         nmea_error("GPVTG parse error!");
00355         return 0;
00356     }
00357 
00358     if( pack->dir_t != 'T' ||
00359         pack->dec_m != 'M' ||
00360         pack->spn_n != 'N' ||
00361         pack->spk_k != 'K')
00362     {
00363         nmea_error("GPVTG parse error (format error)!");
00364         return 0;
00365     }
00366 
00367     return 1;
00368 }
00369 
00375 void nmea_GPGGA2info(nmeaGPGGA *pack, nmeaINFO *info)
00376 {
00377     NMEA_ASSERT(pack && info);
00378 
00379     info->utc.hour = pack->utc.hour;
00380     info->utc.min = pack->utc.min;
00381     info->utc.sec = pack->utc.sec;
00382     info->utc.hsec = pack->utc.hsec;
00383     info->sig = pack->sig;
00384     info->HDOP = pack->HDOP;
00385     info->elv = pack->elv;
00386     info->lat = ((pack->ns == 'N')?pack->lat:-(pack->lat));
00387     info->lon = ((pack->ew == 'E')?pack->lon:-(pack->lon));
00388     info->smask |= GPGGA;
00389 }
00390 
00396 void nmea_GPGSA2info(nmeaGPGSA *pack, nmeaINFO *info)
00397 {
00398     int i, j, nuse = 0;
00399 
00400     NMEA_ASSERT(pack && info);
00401 
00402     info->fix = pack->fix_type;
00403     info->PDOP = pack->PDOP;
00404     info->HDOP = pack->HDOP;
00405     info->VDOP = pack->VDOP;
00406 
00407     for(i = 0; i < NMEA_MAXSAT; ++i)
00408     {
00409         for(j = 0; j < info->satinfo.inview; ++j)
00410         {
00411             if(pack->sat_prn[i] && pack->sat_prn[i] == info->satinfo.sat[j].id)
00412             {
00413                 info->satinfo.sat[j].in_use = 1;
00414                 nuse++;
00415             }
00416         }
00417     }
00418 
00419     info->satinfo.inuse = nuse;
00420     info->smask |= GPGSA;
00421 }
00422 
00428 void nmea_GPGSV2info(nmeaGPGSV *pack, nmeaINFO *info)
00429 {
00430     int isat, isi, nsat;
00431 
00432     NMEA_ASSERT(pack && info);
00433 
00434     if(pack->pack_index > pack->pack_count ||
00435         pack->pack_index * NMEA_SATINPACK > NMEA_MAXSAT)
00436         return;
00437 
00438     if(pack->pack_index < 1)
00439         pack->pack_index = 1;
00440 
00441     info->satinfo.inview = pack->sat_count;
00442 
00443     nsat = (pack->pack_index - 1) * NMEA_SATINPACK;
00444     nsat = (nsat + NMEA_SATINPACK > pack->sat_count)?pack->sat_count - nsat:NMEA_SATINPACK;
00445 
00446     for(isat = 0; isat < nsat; ++isat)
00447     {
00448         isi = (pack->pack_index - 1) * NMEA_SATINPACK + isat;
00449         info->satinfo.sat[isi].id = pack->sat_data[isat].id;
00450         info->satinfo.sat[isi].elv = pack->sat_data[isat].elv;
00451         info->satinfo.sat[isi].azimuth = pack->sat_data[isat].azimuth;
00452         info->satinfo.sat[isi].sig = pack->sat_data[isat].sig;
00453     }
00454 
00455     info->smask |= GPGSV;
00456 }
00457 
00463 void nmea_GPRMC2info(nmeaGPRMC *pack, nmeaINFO *info)
00464 {
00465     NMEA_ASSERT(pack && info);
00466 
00467     if('A' == pack->status)
00468     {
00469         if(NMEA_SIG_BAD == info->sig)
00470             info->sig = NMEA_SIG_MID;
00471         if(NMEA_FIX_BAD == info->fix)
00472             info->fix = NMEA_FIX_2D;
00473     }
00474     else if('V' == pack->status)
00475     {
00476         info->sig = NMEA_SIG_BAD;
00477         info->fix = NMEA_FIX_BAD;
00478     }
00479 
00480     info->utc = pack->utc;
00481     info->lat = ((pack->ns == 'N')?pack->lat:-(pack->lat));
00482     info->lon = ((pack->ew == 'E')?pack->lon:-(pack->lon));
00483     info->speed = pack->speed * NMEA_TUD_KNOTS;
00484     info->direction = pack->direction;
00485     info->smask |= GPRMC;
00486 }
00487 
00493 void nmea_GPVTG2info(nmeaGPVTG *pack, nmeaINFO *info)
00494 {
00495     NMEA_ASSERT(pack && info);
00496 
00497     info->direction = pack->dir;
00498     info->declination = pack->dec;
00499     info->speed = pack->spk;
00500     info->smask |= GPVTG;
00501 }
